description.message: Select from multiple accounts to create new Google Documents & open Google services.

reset.description: Button to restore all settings to default

edit.description: the header for the table preview/editing in settings

first_launch.description: header to show on first launch configuration

options.description: button to show more options on first launch config screen

instructions1.message: Click services to show/hide them in popup, rearrange by dragging, and add an account by clicking anywhere in grid. Add accounts in the order that you signed in to Google with.
instructions1.description: instructions on how to modify table appearance

instructions2.message: These options can be edited later by right clicking on the extension icon & selecting "Options"
instructions2.description: instructions on how to access options
